alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 5:21AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Aransas County through 545 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout over Rockport, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Lamar, Palm Harbor, Key Allegro, Holiday Beach, Copano Village and Fulton. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio
